page.title: 13Clubs & Events
page.content: The two main local clubs are The Leighton Buzzard, Stanbridge and District Riding Club and the Tilsworth and Stanbridge Women's Institute. The first caters for all age groups interested in horse_riding and stages local horse shows and gymkhanas. Various social events connected with equestrian interests eg. trips to the Horse of the Year Show at Wembley, and talks by leading folk in the horse world, are arranged. The Women's Institute holds an annual produce and craft show open to all villagers in addition to its general meetings. The Tilsworth Church annual fete held in the grounds of Tilsworth Manor is an event always worth attending with sideshows and stalls common to most village fetes.
